-- Fetch all active users for monitoring
SELECT 
  id as user_id,
  email,
  display_name,
  language,
  timezone,
  currency,
  created_at
FROM users 
WHERE created_at <= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'  -- Only monitor users active for at least 24 hours
ORDER BY created_at ASC;

-- Get user's financial data for monitoring
WITH user_budgets AS (
  SELECT 
    b.id as budget_id,
    b.category_id,
    sc.name as category_name,
    b.amount as budget_amount,
    b.currency,
    b.period,
    b.start_date,
    b.end_date
  FROM budgets b
  JOIN spending_categories sc ON b.category_id = sc.id
  WHERE b.user_id = '{{ $json.user_id }}' 
    AND b.is_active = true
    AND (b.end_date IS NULL OR b.end_date >= CURRENT_DATE)
),
current_spending AS (
  SELECT 
    t.category_id,
    SUM(t.amount) as total_spent,
    COUNT(*) as transaction_count,
    MAX(t.transaction_date) as last_transaction,
    AVG(t.amount) as avg_transaction
  FROM transactions t
  WHERE t.user_id = '{{ $json.user_id }}'
    AND t.transaction_type = 'expense'
    AND t.transaction_date >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE)
  GROUP BY t.category_id
),
recent_activity AS (
  SELECT 
    COUNT(*) as transactions_last_7_days,
    SUM(amount) as spending_last_7_days,
    AVG(amount) as avg_daily_spending
  FROM transactions
  WHERE user_id = '{{ $json.user_id }}'
    AND transaction_type = 'expense'
    AND transaction_date >= CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '7 days'
)
SELECT 
  '{{ $json.user_id }}' as user_id,
  '{{ $json.email }}' as user_email,
  '{{ $json.language || "en" }}' as user_language,
  '{{ $json.currency || "VND" }}' as user_currency,
  ub.budget_id,
  ub.category_id,
  ub.category_name,
  ub.budget_amount,
  COALESCE(cs.total_spent, 0) as current_spent,
  COALESCE(cs.transaction_count, 0) as transaction_count,
  cs.last_transaction,
  cs.avg_transaction,
  CASE 
    WHEN ub.budget_amount > 0 THEN 
      ROUND((COALESCE(cs.total_spent, 0) / ub.budget_amount) * 100, 1)
    ELSE 0 
  END as budget_utilization_percent,
  ra.transactions_last_7_days,
  ra.spending_last_7_days,
  ra.avg_daily_spending
FROM user_budgets ub
LEFT JOIN current_spending cs ON ub.category_id = cs.category_id
CROSS JOIN recent_activity ra;

-- Check for duplicate alerts in the last 24 hours to prevent spam
SELECT 
  user_id,
  alert_type,
  data->>'category_id' as category_id
FROM alerts 
WHERE user_id = '{{ $json.user_id }}' 
  AND alert_type = '{{ $json.alert_type }}'
  AND (data->>'category_id') = '{{ $json.data.category_id }}'
  AND created_at >= NOW() - INTERVAL '24 hours'
LIMIT 1;

-- Insert new alert into database
INSERT INTO alerts (
  user_id,
  alert_type,
  title,
  message,
  severity,
  data,
  action_url,
  expires_at,
  created_at,
  updated_at
) VALUES (
  '{{ $('Process Alerts for Storage').item.json.user_id }}',
  '{{ $('Process Alerts for Storage').item.json.alert_type }}',
  '{{ $('Process Alerts for Storage').item.json.title }}',
  '{{ $('Process Alerts for Storage').item.json.message }}',
  '{{ $('Process Alerts for Storage').item.json.severity }}',
  '{{ JSON.stringify($('Process Alerts for Storage').item.json.data) }}',
  '{{ $('Process Alerts for Storage').item.json.action_url }}',
  '{{ $('Process Alerts for Storage').item.json.expires_at }}',
  NOW(),
  NOW()
) RETURNING id, title, message, severity, created_at;

-- Get FCM tokens for the user to send push notifications
SELECT 
  u.id as user_id,
  u.email,
  u.language,
  COALESCE(u.fcm_tokens, '[]'::jsonb) as fcm_tokens
FROM users u
WHERE u.id = '{{ $('Process Alerts for Storage').item.json.user_id }}'
  AND JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(COALESCE(u.fcm_tokens, '[]'::jsonb)) > 0;

-- Log monitoring execution summary
INSERT INTO monitoring_logs (
  execution_id,
  execution_start,
  execution_end,
  users_processed,
  alerts_generated,
  notifications_sent,
  status,
  created_at
) VALUES (
  '{{ $('Init Monitoring Context').first().json.execution_id }}',
  '{{ $('Init Monitoring Context').first().json.execution_start }}',
  '{{ $now() }}',
  {{ $('Split Users Batch').first().json.totalItems || 0 }},
  {{ $json.length || 0 }},
  {{ ($json.filter(item => item.notification_sent === true)).length || 0 }},
  'completed',
  NOW()
) ON CONFLICT (execution_id) DO UPDATE SET
  execution_end = EXCLUDED.execution_end,
  users_processed = EXCLUDED.users_processed,
  alerts_generated = EXCLUDED.alerts_generated,
  notifications_sent = EXCLUDED.notifications_sent,
  status = EXCLUDED.status;
